enhanced_by.reason: Both methods process Map<String, Object> parameters, making it beneficial to reuse setup for parameter maps.
urlEncode is used within joinQueryParameters, which is invoked by buildFullUrl, suggesting a shared dependency on URL encoding.
joinQueryParameters(StringBuilder, Map<String, Object>) must be invoked to prepare the query parameters before buildFullUrl can use them.
Both methods involve building URLs, suggesting a similar execution context where one might need to be tested before or after the other.
